segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it makes me so sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, not noticing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is going to get soaked, and she won’t even realize it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, and it’s all going to end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel the sadness of the moment, like everything is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is going to tip, and the boy will fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, not helping at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just step in and fix everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so full of missed opportunities.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little heartbroken watching it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like no one cares enough to make things right.
segments.speaker: PAR
